vanilla.description: Filter the items in the grid by setting an active category. When called it updates the `options.filter` property to reflect the new active category and triggers the `onFilteringStart` event.

args.name: targetFilter
args.description: The target filter towards which to filter the visible category, should be a numerical value based on the data-category attribute of `.filtr-item` elements. The value `'all'` can be used for an unfiltered gallery.
